StackAdapt | Engineering, Sales | Toronto | Full-time | Onsite only

I work at StackAdapt - we're building a platform for to advertisers launch digital ad campaigns seamlessly. We recently just passed 100 people at the company in Toronto and are looking for full-stack engineers, data/ML engineers, and various sales/account management folks!

We have an amazing product that continues to consistently attract more customers and maintain strong user retention (you can see our product reviews on G2 Crowd here: https://www.g2crowd.com/products/stackadapt/reviews). Our team here values giving people the autonomy and support to do awesome things.

We use React, Redux, Rails, Go, Aerospike, MySQL, Scala, Apache Spark, and more.

You can find all the roles here: https://jobs.lever.co/stackadapt

If you have any questions, feel free to email me at notworkingveryhard [at] gmail.com
